channel.title: [PI]Hit 15% Higher If Wearing Certain Item + Slayer Task!?[PI]
channel.description: How do I make it so if you're wearing item ID 8921, you hit 15% higher but only on your current slayer task?

item.title: [PI]Hit 15% Higher If Wearing Certain Item + Slayer Task!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

make 2 if statements declaring if they are on a slayer task and if wearing itemID 9821, under the config use this and read what i vain i said and mess around with it.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499832.0.html

Edit: “How can you make it so if you are attacking a certain monster, they are your slayer task, and you are equipping ‘this’ item, you hit 15% higher?”[/quote]
facepalm Look at the title…
[PI]
